org.openliberty.openaz.pep
Class PepRequestImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.openliberty.openaz.pep.PepRequestImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
PepRequest
public class PepRequestImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements PepRequest

A wrapper around the AzRequestContext that implements the PepRequest interface for PDPs that use AzApi to issue requests and process responses.

Basically, the purpose of this class is to translate the objects passed to the PepRequestFactoryImpl to the associated AzAttributes used by AzApi, by using the JavaObjectMappers that are designed to translate specific types of Java Objects to specific sets of AzAttributes.

Author:
Josh Bregman, Rich Levinson, Prateek Mishra

Constructor Detail

PepRequestImpl

protected PepRequestImpl(AzRequestContext ctx,
                         PepRequestFactory pepRequestFactory,
                         PepRequestOperation operation)
Internal PepRequestImpl constructor used by PepRequestFactoryImpl to support the factory's newPepRequest methods.

Parameters:
ctx - the actual AzRequestContext
pepRequestFactory - the pepRequestFactory used to create this request. This handle is used to access the EnvironmentFactory,SubjectFactory,ActionFactory,ResourceFactory and PepResponseFactory to create the objects needed to create the request and response.
See Also:
EnvironmentFactory, ActionFactory, ResourceFactory, SubjectFactory, PepResponseFactoryImpl
Method Detail

decide

public PepResponse decide()
                   throws PepException
Calls the AzService for a decision and returns the information to the caller in the form of a PepResponse

Specified by:
decide in interface PepRequest
Returns:
a PepResponse from the configured DecisionHandler
Throws:
PepException - if there was an error in processing the request. There is some ability by the PepResponseFactory to determine under what circumstances (i.e. XACML results and status codes) to throw an exception.
See Also:
PepResponseImpl, PepResponseFactoryImpl

getAzRequestContext

public AzRequestContext getAzRequestContext()
This method is used to allow access to the underlying AzRequestContext that was created by the PepRequestFactory. It contains all of the state, so any changes made against it are in no way reflected in any of the objects in the pep package

Specified by:
getAzRequestContext in interface PepRequest
Returns:
the handle to the AzRequestContext

mapJavaObject

protected <T extends java.lang.Enum<T> & AzCategoryId> Attributes<T> mapJavaObject(java.lang.Object javaObject,
                                                                                  RequestAttributes<T> reqAttrT,
                                                                                  RequestAttributesFactory<T> reqAttrFactoryT)
                                                                       throws PepException
Iterates through all of the JavaObjectMapper mappers. The first mapper that says that it can do the mapping does, and the object is returned.

Parameters:
javaObject -
Returns:
an Attributes collection containing the mapped attributes
Throws:
PepException - if there is no mapper which can map the javaObject

setBulkResourceActions

public void setBulkResourceActions(java.util.List resourceObjects,
                                   java.util.List actionObjects)
                            throws PepException
Sets the bulk resource-action objects for this PepRequestImpl. Preserves to original objects for correlation with returned results in PepResponseImpl.

Specified by:
setBulkResourceActions in interface PepRequest
Parameters:
resourceObjects - a List of length n of resource objects
actionObjects - a List of length n of action objects
Throws:
PepException

setQueryReturnAllowed

public void setQueryReturnAllowed(boolean queryReturnAllowed)
Description copied from interface: PepRequest
Sets the boolean to true if only a Set of Allowed decisions are to be returned, and false if only a Set of Denied decisions is to be returned.

Specified by:
setQueryReturnAllowed in interface PepRequest
See Also:
PepRequestFactory.newQueryPepRequest(java.lang.Object, java.lang.Object, java.lang.String, org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.constants.PepRequestQueryType)

isQueryForAllowedResults

public boolean isQueryForAllowedResults()
Returns a boolean indicating whether the results indicate what is allowed (true) or not allowed (false). The boolean is determined by the value of the PepRequestQueryType that was set in the PepRequestFactory.newQueryPepRequest(Object, Object, String, org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.constants.PepRequestQueryType) method to specify the type of results intended to be returned.

Specified by:
isQueryForAllowedResults in interface PepRequest

getOperation

public PepRequestOperation getOperation()
Return the PepRequestOperation for the current PepRequest, which is the type of request: a single decide, a bulk request, or a query.

Specified by:
getOperation in interface PepRequest
